summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 DODGE CHALLENGER. WHILE THE CONTACT WAS ADJUSTING THE FRONT PASSENGER SEAT TO MOVE THE TRACK BACK AND FORTH, THE PARTS FRACTURED AND THE SEAT FAILED TO SECURE BACK ON THE TRACK. THE DEALER (CHRYSLER IN OTTAWA, 510 E NORRIS DR, OTTAWA, IL 61350, (866) 374-5828) INDICATED THAT THE SEAT TRACK NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE MANUFACTURER PROVIDED NO RECALL SOLUTION OTHER THAN THE PART BEING REPLACED BY A DEALER. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 65,000.
